name: Whesher
description: Well well Doomers, what's going on here? DooMWaR here! find the BFG-9000 and say "Yippie Kai Yay motherfuckers!" ok, so this wad has 2 maps. the first map is cooperative or single and the second map is deathmatch. awesome, doesn't it? i mean AWESOME. and i think this is the GREATEST map ever made, don't ya think? By the way, I SAY AGAIN...Don't forget to visit my website and Email me if you want...
